item.title: 1 Billion Clicks
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

Auto clicks 1bclicks.com… See that page for explination…

Please everyone who can run it constantly, I’m trying to destroy this “experiment with sociology.”

[code]

1 Billion Clicks. var amt = 0; var on = false; 
  function count() {
    if(on) { 
      document.getElementById('info').innerHTML = "<iframe style='border: none; width: 300px; height: 100px; overflow: hidden;' src='http://1bclicks.com/doc.php'></iframe>";
      setTimeout("count();", 1000);
    }
  }

  function clicked() {
    if(on) { 
      document.getElementById('clicked').innerHTML = "<iframe style='display: none;' src='http://1bclicks.com/clicked.php'></iframe>";
      amt++;
      document.getElementById('amount').innerHTML = "Clicked <b>" + amt + "<b> times.";
      setTimeout("clicked();", 150 + Math.random() * 100);
    }
  }
  
  function reset() {
    amt = 0;
  }

  function start() {
    count();
    clicked();
  }

  function toggle() {
    if(on) {
      on = false;
      document.getElementById('toggle').value = "On";
    } else {
      on = true;
      start();
      document.getElementById('toggle').value = "Off";
    }
  }
</script>
One Billion Clicks Auto Clicker
  <div id="amount" align="center">amount</div>

  <div id="info" style="border-top: 1px solid black; border-bottom: 1px solid black;">info</div>

  <div id="clicked"></div>

  <input name="Submit" type="button" onclick="javascript:reset();" value="Reset" />
  <input id="toggle" name="Submit" type="button" onclick="javascript:toggle();" value="Off" />
</div>
[/code]

Read full topic
